import React, { useState } from "react"; function Login({setIsLoggedIn}) { const [lecturerData, setLecturerData] = useState(null); const [lecturerRole, setlecturerRole] = useState(false); const [studentData, setStudentData] = useState(null); const [studentRole, setStudentRole] = useState(false); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log(JSON.stringify({ username })); fetch("/login", { headers: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*", "Content-Type": "application/json", }, method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify({ username }), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { data.role === "Lecturer" ? setlecturerRole(true) : setStudentRole(true); data.role === "Lecturer" ? setLecturerData({ username: data.username, role: data.role }) : setStudentData({ username: data.username, role: data.role }); }); } return (
